subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
Lawns
lead_paragraph: The TruFirm, which looks a little like a bicycle pump with a hand-held computer reader attached, measures the firmness of a green, a fairway or even a bunker.
snippet: The TruFirm, which looks a little like a bicycle pump with a hand-held computer reader attached, measures the firmness of a green, a fairway or even a bunker.
